alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clay; Lowndes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:10AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Choctaw, northern Noxubee, Oktibbeha, northeastern Winston, southeastern Clay and Lowndes Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 209 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from near Ackerman to near Brooksville and northward to just west of Columbus, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starkville, Columbus, Macon, Ackerman, Pickensville, Brooksville, Crawford, Artesia, Longview, Sturgis, Sessums, Betheden, Prairie Point, Craig Springs, Oktoc, Bent Oak, Chester, Deerbrook, Bigbee Valley and Tibbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central, northeastern and east central Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Choctaw; Clay; Lowndes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Winston
